trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around August 2nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside my house on Aug 2. at about 12-1 am, saw hovering above one of the houses, got in my car & started recording.. It was a really bright blue light and seemed to be blinking from blue to purple and back to blue again. The object seemed to be randomly moving back and forth at various speeds, and as it's a bit harder to see in the video, was giving off a VERY bright light and would change from blue to purple at one point.
